caption: If I could give zero stars I would!! Rude staff and horrible food. Burgers were completely raw and soggy. Place was also located in an alley.

We just ordered from this place, we thought we were getting pranked. What happened to the real Umami Burgers?? Is this a joke? I would never put a bad review, but this time I just can’t let it pass. The patties were ridiculously tiny, the …

My first time exploring LA and I have to say this was one of my favorite places. The burgers were great and so were the fries. The staff was friendly and service was quick. The restaurant itself was clean and cozy. I totally recommend going if you're looking for a good burger. Definitely going again when I venture to the Bay area.
I would honestly give this place a zero stars! I don’t leave reviews but this place must be avoided! Go to another umami! This location doesn’t know the difference between their own burgers! TRASH!
